data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Maulvibazar.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Maulvibazar, Sylhet, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,919,100 people living in the county of Maulvibazar.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Maulvibazar, Sylhet, Bangladesh.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Maulvibazar, Sylhet, Bangladesh. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Maulvibazar.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Jaraj (Muslim traditions) people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 1,919,100 citizens of the the county of Maulvibazar.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 2,404 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.section_summary:
the county of Maulvibazar, Sylhet, Bangladesh has a population of 1,919,100.

We estimate Maulvibazar has 2,404 people who might know Jesus, 5,757 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,910,939 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Maulvibazar you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.
